list.name: EECS 494 Game Development Project 1: Legend of Zelda
list.desc: This project is a 2D game remake of the very first version of Legend of Zelda on Nintendo NES. We reimplemented almost all the game features of the original Legend of Zelda game. Other than that, we have implmented some new features, providing the game a bit of modern feel.

list.name: EECS 494 Game Development Project 2: (Under Construction)
list.desc: This is a project that I am currently working on. Stay tunned.
